content: sts cr cable right = move 1 stitch on cable needle and hold to back of work k1 k1 from cable needle cluster cable left = move 1 stitch on cable needle and hold to front of work k1 k1 from cable needle ssk = slip 1 stitch knitwise slip 1 stitch knitwise knit the slipped sts together through back loops p2tog = purl 2 together k2tog = knit 2 together knittitude 2014 4
